Name: Inside My Mind
About the game: What's going on in our head!? A lot of thoughts, tasks, memories and emotions. In this bright game ' In my mind‚Äù you will plunge into a bright world of adventure, move along the lines beware of dangers and look for a way out. The main character is an eye, he can move very quickly through the cells, he emits light and energy, but is afraid of saws and sharp blocks with skulls. Features of the game: Fast moving through lines Bright main character Bright level design Simple puzzles Achievements for completing levels
